scripts.newman-tests: newman run iTunesAPI.postman_collection.json --reporters cli,junit,htmlextra --reporter-junit-export 'report/newmanreport.xml' --reporter-htmlextra-export 'report/report.html' --reporter-htmlextra-browserTitle 'Test summary' --reporter-htmlextra-title 'iTunes API test dashboard' --reporter-htmlextra-titleSize 4 --reporter-htmlextra-logs --reporter-htmlextra-omitHeaders
